item.title: Sketches
item.author: beemarkableart@gmail.com (Emilija)
item.description: Through the delicate dance of pencil and paper, imagination finds its form. This category honors the art of illustration — where every line, shade, and curve tells a story born from creativity, emotion, and exploration. From abstract visions to lifelike portraits, these sketches capture moments that exist beyond words.
